title: ammA jnAnam aLikkum (dv)
sahitya:
ammA jnAnam aLikkum suriya dEvanE Ayiram karpanai vazhangum sOmadEvanE


anupallavi

  bhU nidhi pugazh pADi tarum angAraka guhanE pOTrum kalvip-pU mAlai aruLum budha bhagavAnE
			(muktAyi svara sAhitya)
santAna yOgamum dhanamum nAlgum dEva guruvE saubhAgyamum dAramum udaviDum shukkirat-tiruvE
vAzhum AyuLai vaghuttiDum shanip-periyOnE valamAna bhOgamum mOkSamum tandiDum rAhu kEtuvE


caraNam    nallaruL purindiDuvIr sharaNam sharaNam nambinEn
